title: How do senior citizens catch with the technology, which is becoming essential for day to day life? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am senior citizen myself, now in my late 60s. I started updating myself about 20 years back by interacting with people using computers. Once I learnt to use computers in my technical work, I started my self-learning process to use the internet for getting any info I wanted on the internet. Nowadays people only need to learn using a smartphone. Once they start browsing the internet on their smart phone, they can learn everything else from the internet.

I saw an older vegetable vendor in a passenger train.it was a hot weather and around noon she dozed in the compartment near the toilet.The train was about to reach its //destination.By around 3–00 pm I found her taking an android phone and giving instructions to someone placing orders.So will be the senior citizens.
